title: Do you believe in heaven and hell? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe that heaven and hell are both real, but at the same time I also believe in rebirth, which is kind of the opposite, because you’re reborn rather than spending the rest of your life in hell or heaven. I prefer that method more, because I can’t comprehend or stand the fact that if there were rebirth, I could’ve had infinite lives beforehand, but couldn’t remember them. I’d prefer to keep my memory, even if I had to go to hell.

Heaven and hell? Why would I believe in such concepts? There is no evidence to support such nonsense. Here is what we do know, all throughout human history cultures have made up many versions of some afterlife, these concepts are of the human imagination and nothing more, old stories and fables are just that, stories and fables. There is no evidence of an afterlife whatsoever. That is why I question such claims, until such claims meet the burden of proof I will remain skeptical. Wally

When I was small I had some horrible nightmares of “hell” for sure. I believe it was due to the parochial school we attended and by the way, we were a charity case in case anybody wondered. It was important to our mother at that time especially to have our “First Communion” during those earlier years and to believe in the Catholic teachings especially “The Ten Commandments.” A lof of what the bible preached gave the impression that those that don’t honor the “Ten Commandments” will surely die and go to hell. So as a child and didn’t think I wasn’t so obedient that I dreamed of hell a lot.

There is definitely a heaven to gain and a hell to stay away from. Wise people will accept Christ’s offer of salvation and His plan for eternal life. Revelation 21:8 "But the cowardly, the unbelieving, the vile, the murderers, the sexually immoral, those who practice magic arts, the idolaters and all liars--they will be consigned to the fiery lake of burning sulfur. This is the second death." Romans 10:9 “If you declare with your mouth, 'Jesus is Lord,' and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.” John 3:16 For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son that whosoever believes on Him should not perish but have eternal life. Acts 6:31 "Believe in the Lord Jesus Christ and you will be saved"

Some people believe that heaven and hell are a state of mind , you create your own hell in your mind or you can create your own heaven in your mind . You live and dwell in that atmosphere. I'm inclined to agree with that because I have seen a lot of people that dwell in either atmosphere.

Well, figuratively. I mean, there’s my backyard and then there’s work. Literally? Hell no. There’s a lot of scholars who think the ancient people who invented heaven and hell knew they were speaking figuratively too. It’s just a few modern religious people who take it literally.

I do not. As an atheist I don’t believe in construct set up by an entity whose existence is unbelievable. As a skeptic I don’t believe in either as sufficient evidence hasn’t been provided for either.
I do not doubt. I know the truth that there are both. God's word the bible makes it very clear. Study his word and then doubt no more.

There is heaven and I believe in God. The society now brainwashes us not to think about eternal life because the enemy is reigning in this world. I hope you will be enlightened as well and realize that living for God is so much better than anything or anyone else.
I don't believe in anything Fairytale and Fable created by humans. Born with a Freethinking mind.
